messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the condition for a deeper version of a spell to be available?
If the roll is equal to or below the investigator’s skill
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the deeper version of a spell once it is discovered?
It remains available thereafter
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can there be further deeper levels of a spell to be discovered in the future?
This is a matter for the Keeper to decide
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Is it recommended for Keepers to discover deeper versions of spells on the fly?
No, it is advised to plan ahead
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the role of the Keeper in determining deeper versions of spells?
The Keeper decides
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can all Mythos entities and cultists know deeper versions of spells?
No, they only know them if they have zero Sanity points
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How should the Keeper determine if other enemies know deeper versions of spells?
At the Keeper's discretion
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Should the Keeper roll to determine if other enemies learn deeper versions of spells?
No, they should not feel obliged to roll
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should Keepers plan ahead when introducing spells?
spells that might fall into the hands of investigators
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to Mythos entities and cultists with zero Sanity points who know a certain spell?
they also know the deeper versions as listed in the Grimoire
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How should the Keeper decide if an enemy learns a deeper version of a spell?
at the Keeper's discretion
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should the deeper version of a spell be compared to?
a mundane mechanical benefit such as the spell costing fewer magic points
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of altering a spell in a horror game?
Essentially the deeper version should be an exciting (and more horrific) development of the spell rather than a mundane mechanical benefit.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can be expected from spell variations in the game?
There is no such thing as a definitive spell.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the role of the Keeper in relation to spell variations?
Part of the Keeper’s job is to act as intermediary between this Grimoire and the players.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the general expectation for characters gaining spells in the game?
The players should be aware that any spells their investigators gain may vary from the ones listed in this book.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the role of the Keeper in this game?
The Keeper acts as intermediary between the Grimoire and the players.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are the three parts of a spell in this game?
A spell is made up of a cost, a description, and an effect.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How can the cost of a spell be altered?
The cost of a spell can be altered, although careful consideration is required.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of a spell's description?
The description is simply dramatic color and can be changed with relative ease.
